modName: The Lusty Argonian Maid - female argonian follower
summary: Ever wish to meet the heroine of the bestseller The Lusty Argonian Maid? Here she is, and can\'t wait to carry out your orders!
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a female argonian follower to the game. Her name is Lifts-Her-Tail, and she can be found in Riften, in the Bee&Barb. She is good with one-handed weapons. Very good indeed... and also can use the bow.
 She has human voice, since there\'s no female argonian follower voice in the CK. :( I\'m planning to add unique voice to her with unique lines!

Install: extract the .esp file and the textures, meshes folders into your Data folder. Check the .esp file in the launcher.

For the screenshots I used:
FAR - Forgotten Argonian Roots: argonian textures http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/42043//?
CBBE: better body for females. I use this, you can use others, which is compatible with beast races :) http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666//?
Climates of Tamriel http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17802//?
Stakado\\\\\\\'s Cinemascope ENB: an ENB with almost no fps loss http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15425//?
Dynavision: Depth of Field http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12525//?

Screenshots and endorsements are welcome! ;)
author: Fiszi
